p: The cytotoxicities of compound 297 were tested by using human promyelocytic leukemia HL-60, human hepatoma SMMC-7721, non-small cell lung cancer A-549, breast cancer MCF-7 and human colorectal carcinoma SW4801 cell lines, 297 showed cytotoxicity against MCF-7 with the ratio of inhibition at 72% for a concentration at 40 µM (IC 50 of positive control Taxol < 0.008 µM) [ 98].
